pages.text: Diploceraspis is an amphibian from the Permian period that was related to Diplocaulus. It had a much thinner head crest than Diplocaulus and was much smaller, only measuring to about half a meter in length.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Spawn like Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Egg Collection Phial
